item.title: Research Overview
item.description: Classical and quantum mechanics fundamentals Urzúa, A. R., Ramos-Prieto, I., Soto-Eguibar, F., & Moya-Cessa, H. (2020). Dynamical analysis of mass–spring models using Lie algebraic methods. In Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications (Vol. 540, p. 123193).
